articles.author: India Today World Desk
articles.title: Indian-American man sues boat captain, Florida resort after wife dies while parasailing on vacation - India Today
articles.description: An Indian-American man filed a lawsuit against a boat captain and his resort, alleging negligence and wrongful death after his wife died while parasailing on vacation in the US state of Florida.
articles.content: By India Today World Desk: An Indian-American man has filed a lawsuit this week against a boat captain and his resort for negligence and wrongful death after his wife died while parasailing on vacati… [+1910 chars]
